name: livebook
tagline: A self-hosted notebook for running and sharing Elixir workflows
description: Livebook is a self-hosted notebook application for running Elixir code, visualizing data, and creating interactive workflows. It includes collaboration features and integrates with machine learning tools and runtimes.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Elixir code execution, Data visualization, Live collaboration. Jupyter for Elixir

features.title: Machine Learning
features.description: ML integrations, Data processing, Model training. Build ML workflows in Elixir

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Multi-user editing, Shared sessions, Team workflows. Work together on notebooks

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run locally, Custom deployment, Full control. Own your notebook environment
